2681    /**
2682     * Calculates the space required for all the axes in the plot.
2683     *
2684     * @param g2  the graphics device.
2685     * @param plotArea  the plot area.
2686     *
2687     * @return The required space.
2688     */
2689    protected AxisSpace calculateAxisSpace(Graphics2D g2,
2690                                           Rectangle2D plotArea) {
2691        AxisSpace space = new AxisSpace();
2692        space = calculateRangeAxisSpace(g2, plotArea, space);
2693        Rectangle2D revPlotArea = space.shrink(plotArea, null);
2694        space = calculateDomainAxisSpace(g2, revPlotArea, space);
2695        return space;
2696    }
2697
2698    /**
2699     * Calculates the space required for the domain axis/axes.
2700     *
2701     * @param g2  the graphics device.
2702     * @param plotArea  the plot area.
2703     * @param space  a carrier for the result ({@code null} permitted).
2704     *
2705     * @return The required space.
2706     */
2707    protected AxisSpace calculateDomainAxisSpace(Graphics2D g2, 
2708            Rectangle2D plotArea, AxisSpace space) {
2709
2710        if (space == null) {
2711            space = new AxisSpace();
2712        }
2713
2714        // reserve some space for the domain axis...
2715        if (this.fixedDomainAxisSpace != null) {
2716            if (this.orientation == PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL) {
2717                space.ensureAtLeast(this.fixedDomainAxisSpace.getLeft(),
2718                        RectangleEdge.LEFT);
2719                space.ensureAtLeast(this.fixedDomainAxisSpace.getRight(),
2720                        RectangleEdge.RIGHT);
2721            }
2722            else if (this.orientation == PlotOrientation.VERTICAL) {
2723                space.ensureAtLeast(this.fixedDomainAxisSpace.getTop(),
2724                        RectangleEdge.TOP);
2725                space.ensureAtLeast(this.fixedDomainAxisSpace.getBottom(),
2726                        RectangleEdge.BOTTOM);
2727            }
2728        }
2729        else {
2730            // reserve space for the domain axes...
2731            for (ValueAxis axis: this.domainAxes.values()) {
2732                if (axis != null) {
2733                    RectangleEdge edge = getDomainAxisEdge(
2734                            findDomainAxisIndex(axis));
2735                    space = axis.reserveSpace(g2, this, plotArea, edge, space);
2736                }
2737            }
2738        }
2739
2740        return space;
2741
2742    }
2743
2744    /**
2745     * Calculates the space required for the range axis/axes.
2746     *
2747     * @param g2  the graphics device.
2748     * @param plotArea  the plot area.
2749     * @param space  a carrier for the result ({@code null} permitted).
2750     *
2751     * @return The required space.
2752     */
2753    protected AxisSpace calculateRangeAxisSpace(Graphics2D g2, 
2754            Rectangle2D plotArea, AxisSpace space) {
2755
2756        if (space == null) {
2757            space = new AxisSpace();
2758        }
2759
2760        // reserve some space for the range axis...
2761        if (this.fixedRangeAxisSpace != null) {
2762            if (this.orientation == PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL) {
2763                space.ensureAtLeast(this.fixedRangeAxisSpace.getTop(),
2764                        RectangleEdge.TOP);
2765                space.ensureAtLeast(this.fixedRangeAxisSpace.getBottom(),
2766                        RectangleEdge.BOTTOM);
2767            }
2768            else if (this.orientation == PlotOrientation.VERTICAL) {
2769                space.ensureAtLeast(this.fixedRangeAxisSpace.getLeft(),
2770                        RectangleEdge.LEFT);
2771                space.ensureAtLeast(this.fixedRangeAxisSpace.getRight(),
2772                        RectangleEdge.RIGHT);
2773            }
2774        }
2775        else {
2776            // reserve space for the range axes...
2777            for (ValueAxis axis: this.rangeAxes.values()) {
2778                if (axis != null) {
2779                    RectangleEdge edge = getRangeAxisEdge(
2780                            findRangeAxisIndex(axis));
2781                    space = axis.reserveSpace(g2, this, plotArea, edge, space);
2782                }
2783            }
2784        }
2785        return space;
2786
2787    }
2788
2789    /**
2790     * Trims a rectangle to integer coordinates.
2791     *
2792     * @param rect  the incoming rectangle.
2793     *
2794     * @return A rectangle with integer coordinates.
2795     */
2796    private Rectangle integerise(Rectangle2D rect) {
2797        int x0 = (int) Math.ceil(rect.getMinX());
2798        int y0 = (int) Math.ceil(rect.getMinY());
2799        int x1 = (int) Math.floor(rect.getMaxX());
2800        int y1 = (int) Math.floor(rect.getMaxY());
2801        return new Rectangle(x0, y0, (x1 - x0), (y1 - y0));
2802    }
2803
2804    /**
2805     * Receives a chart element visitor.  Many plot subclasses will override
2806     * this method to handle their subcomponents.
2807     * 
2808     * @param visitor  the visitor ({@code null} not permitted).
2809     */
2810    @Override
2811    public void receive(ChartElementVisitor visitor) {
2812        for (Entry<Integer, ValueAxis> entry : this.domainAxes.entrySet()) {
2813            if (entry.getValue() != null) {
2814                entry.getValue().receive(visitor);
2815            }
2816        }
2817        for (Entry<Integer, ValueAxis> entry : this.rangeAxes.entrySet()) {
2818            if (entry.getValue() != null) {
2819                entry.getValue().receive(visitor);
2820            }
2821        }
2822        // visit the renderers
2823        for (Entry<Integer, XYItemRenderer> entry : this.renderers.entrySet()) {
2824            if (entry.getValue() != null) {
2825                entry.getValue().receive(visitor);
2826            }            
2827        }
2828
2829        visitor.visit(this);
2830    }
2831
2832    /**
2833     * Draws the plot within the specified area on a graphics device.
2834     *
2835     * @param g2  the graphics device.
2836     * @param area  the plot area (in Java2D space).
2837     * @param anchor  an anchor point in Java2D space ({@code null}
2838     *                permitted).
2839     * @param parentState  the state from the parent plot, if there is one
2840     *                     ({@code null} permitted).
2841     * @param info  collects chart drawing information ({@code null}
2842     *              permitted).
2843     */
2844    @Override
2845    public void draw(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area, Point2D anchor,
2846            PlotState parentState, PlotRenderingInfo info) {
2847
2848        // if the plot area is too small, just return...
2849        boolean b1 = (area.getWidth() <= MINIMUM_WIDTH_TO_DRAW);
2850        boolean b2 = (area.getHeight() <= MINIMUM_HEIGHT_TO_DRAW);
2851        if (b1 || b2) {
2852            return;
2853        }
2854
2855        // record the plot area...
2856        if (info != null) {
2857            info.setPlotArea(area);
2858        }
2859
2860        // adjust the drawing area for the plot insets (if any)...
2861        RectangleInsets insets = getInsets();
2862        insets.trim(area);
2863
2864        AxisSpace space = calculateAxisSpace(g2, area);
2865        Rectangle2D dataArea = space.shrink(area, null);
2866        this.axisOffset.trim(dataArea);
2867
2868        dataArea = integerise(dataArea);
2869        if (dataArea.isEmpty()) {
2870            return;
2871        }
2872        createAndAddEntity((Rectangle2D) dataArea.clone(), info, null, null);
2873        if (info != null) {
2874            info.setDataArea(dataArea);
2875        }
2876
2877        // draw the plot background and axes...
2878        drawBackground(g2, dataArea);
2879        Map<Axis, AxisState> axisStateMap = drawAxes(g2, area, dataArea, info);
2880
2881        PlotOrientation orient = getOrientation();
2882
2883        // the anchor point is typically the point where the mouse last
2884        // clicked - the crosshairs will be driven off this point...
2885        if (anchor != null && !dataArea.contains(anchor)) {
2886            anchor = null;
2887        }
2888        CrosshairState crosshairState = new CrosshairState();
2889        crosshairState.setCrosshairDistance(Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY);
2890        crosshairState.setAnchor(anchor);
2891
2892        crosshairState.setAnchorX(Double.NaN);
2893        crosshairState.setAnchorY(Double.NaN);
2894        anchor_extracted(anchor, dataArea, orient, crosshairState);
2895        crosshairState.setCrosshairX(getDomainCrosshairValue());
2896        crosshairState.setCrosshairY(getRangeCrosshairValue());
2897        Shape originalClip = g2.getClip();
2898        Composite originalComposite = g2.getComposite();
2899
2900        g2.clip(dataArea);
2901        g2.setComposite(AlphaComposite.getInstance(AlphaComposite.SRC_OVER,
2902                getForegroundAlpha()));
2903
2904        rangeaxis_extracted(g2, parentState, dataArea, axisStateMap);
2905
2906        Graphics2D savedG2 = g2;
2907        BufferedImage dataImage = null;
2908        boolean suppressShadow = Boolean.TRUE.equals(g2.getRenderingHint(
2909                JFreeChart.KEY_SUPPRESS_SHADOW_GENERATION));
2910        if (this.shadowGenerator != null && !suppressShadow) {
2911            dataImage = new BufferedImage((int) dataArea.getWidth(),
2912                    (int)dataArea.getHeight(), BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB);
2913            g2 = dataImage.createGraphics();
2914            g2.translate(-dataArea.getX(), -dataArea.getY());
2915            g2.setRenderingHints(savedG2.getRenderingHints());
2916        }
2917
2918        // draw the markers that are associated with a specific dataset...
2919        for (XYDataset<S> dataset: this.datasets.values()) {
2920            int datasetIndex = indexOf(dataset);
2921            drawDomainMarkers(g2, dataArea, datasetIndex, Layer.BACKGROUND);
2922        }
2923        for (XYDataset<S> dataset: this.datasets.values()) {
2924            int datasetIndex = indexOf(dataset);
2925            drawRangeMarkers(g2, dataArea, datasetIndex, Layer.BACKGROUND);
2926        }
2927
2928        // now draw annotations and render data items...
2929        boolean foundData = false;
2930        DatasetRenderingOrder order = getDatasetRenderingOrder();
2931        List<Integer> rendererIndices = getRendererIndices(order);
2932        List<Integer> datasetIndices = getDatasetIndices(order);
2933
2934        // draw background annotations
2935        foundData = for_extract(g2, info, dataArea, crosshairState, foundData, rendererIndices, datasetIndices);
2936
2937        // draw domain crosshair if required...
2938        int datasetIndex = crosshairState.getDatasetIndex();
2939        ValueAxis xAxis = getDomainAxisForDataset(datasetIndex);
2940        RectangleEdge xAxisEdge = getDomainAxisEdge(getDomainAxisIndex(xAxis));
2941        if (!this.domainCrosshairLockedOnData && anchor != null) {
2942            double xx;
2943            if (orient == PlotOrientation.VERTICAL) {
2944                xx = xAxis.java2DToValue(anchor.getX(), dataArea, xAxisEdge);
2945            }
2946            else {
2947                xx = xAxis.java2DToValue(anchor.getY(), dataArea, xAxisEdge);
2948            }
2949            crosshairState.setCrosshairX(xx);
2950        }
2951        setDomainCrosshairValue(crosshairState.getCrosshairX(), false);
2952        if (isDomainCrosshairVisible()) {
2953            double x = getDomainCrosshairValue();
2954            Paint paint = getDomainCrosshairPaint();
2955            Stroke stroke = getDomainCrosshairStroke();
2956            drawDomainCrosshair(g2, dataArea, orient, x, xAxis, stroke, paint);
2957        }
2958
2959        // draw range crosshair if required...
2960        drawrange(g2, anchor, dataArea, orient, crosshairState, foundData, rendererIndices, datasetIndex);
2961
2962        drawAnnotations(g2, dataArea, info);
2963        if (this.shadowGenerator != null && !suppressShadow) {
2964            BufferedImage shadowImage
2965                    = this.shadowGenerator.createDropShadow(dataImage);
2966            g2 = savedG2;
2967            g2.drawImage(shadowImage, (int) dataArea.getX()
2968                    + this.shadowGenerator.calculateOffsetX(),
2969                    (int) dataArea.getY()
2970                    + this.shadowGenerator.calculateOffsetY(), null);
2971            g2.drawImage(dataImage, (int) dataArea.getX(),
2972                    (int) dataArea.getY(), null);
2973        }
2974        g2.setClip(originalClip);
2975        g2.setComposite(originalComposite);
2976
2977        drawOutline(g2, dataArea);
2978
2979    }
2980
2981        private void drawrange(Graphics2D g2, Point2D anchor, Rectangle2D dataArea, PlotOrientation orient,
2982                        CrosshairState crosshairState, boolean foundData, List<Integer> rendererIndices, int datasetIndex) {
2983                ValueAxis yAxis = getRangeAxisForDataset(datasetIndex);
2984        RectangleEdge yAxisEdge = getRangeAxisEdge(getRangeAxisIndex(yAxis));
2985        if (!this.rangeCrosshairLockedOnData && anchor != null) {
2986            double yy;
2987            if (orient == PlotOrientation.VERTICAL) {
2988                yy = yAxis.java2DToValue(anchor.getY(), dataArea, yAxisEdge);
2989            } else {
2990                yy = yAxis.java2DToValue(anchor.getX(), dataArea, yAxisEdge);
2991            }
2992            crosshairState.setCrosshairY(yy);
2993        }
2994        setRangeCrosshairValue(crosshairState.getCrosshairY(), false);
2995        if (isRangeCrosshairVisible()) {
2996            double y = getRangeCrosshairValue();
2997            Paint paint = getRangeCrosshairPaint();
2998            Stroke stroke = getRangeCrosshairStroke();
2999            drawRangeCrosshair(g2, dataArea, orient, y, yAxis, stroke, paint);
3000        }
3001
3002        if (!foundData) {
3003            drawNoDataMessage(g2, dataArea);
3004        }
3005
3006        for (int i : rendererIndices) { 
3007            drawDomainMarkers(g2, dataArea, i, Layer.FOREGROUND);
3008        }
3009        for (int i : rendererIndices) {
3010            drawRangeMarkers(g2, dataArea, i, Layer.FOREGROUND);
3011        }
3012        }
3013
3014        private boolean for_extract(Graphics2D g2, PlotRenderingInfo info, Rectangle2D dataArea,
3015                        CrosshairState crosshairState, boolean foundData, List<Integer> rendererIndices,
3016                        List<Integer> datasetIndices) {
3017                for (int i : rendererIndices) {
3018            XYItemRenderer renderer = getRenderer(i);
3019            if (renderer != null) {
3020                ValueAxis domainAxis = getDomainAxisForDataset(i);
3021                ValueAxis rangeAxis = getRangeAxisForDataset(i);
3022                renderer.drawAnnotations(g2, dataArea, domainAxis, rangeAxis, 
3023                        Layer.BACKGROUND, info);
3024            }
3025        }
3026
3027        // render data items...
3028        for (int datasetIndex : datasetIndices) {
3029            foundData = render(g2, dataArea, datasetIndex, info, 
3030                    crosshairState) || foundData;
3031        }
3032
3033        // draw foreground annotations
3034        for (int i : rendererIndices) {
3035            XYItemRenderer renderer = getRenderer(i);
3036            if (renderer != null) {
3037                    ValueAxis domainAxis = getDomainAxisForDataset(i);
3038                    ValueAxis rangeAxis = getRangeAxisForDataset(i);
3039                renderer.drawAnnotations(g2, dataArea, domainAxis, rangeAxis, 
3040                            Layer.FOREGROUND, info);
3041            }
3042        }
3043                return foundData;
3044        }
3045
3046        private void rangeaxis_extracted(Graphics2D g2, PlotState parentState, Rectangle2D dataArea,
3047                        Map<Axis, AxisState> axisStateMap) {
3048                AxisState domainAxisState = axisStateMap.get(getDomainAxis());
3049        if (domainAxisState == null) {
3050            if (parentState != null) {
3051                domainAxisState = parentState.getSharedAxisStates()
3052                        .get(getDomainAxis());
3053            }
3054        }
3055
3056        AxisState rangeAxisState = axisStateMap.get(getRangeAxis());
3057        if (rangeAxisState == null) {
3058            if (parentState != null) {
3059                rangeAxisState = parentState.getSharedAxisStates()
3060                        .get(getRangeAxis());
3061            }
3062        }
3063        if (domainAxisState != null) {
3064            drawDomainTickBands(g2, dataArea, domainAxisState.getTicks());
3065        }
3066        if (rangeAxisState != null) {
3067            drawRangeTickBands(g2, dataArea, rangeAxisState.getTicks());
3068        }
3069        if (domainAxisState != null) {
3070            drawDomainGridlines(g2, dataArea, domainAxisState.getTicks());
3071            drawZeroDomainBaseline(g2, dataArea);
3072        }
3073        if (rangeAxisState != null) {
3074            drawRangeGridlines(g2, dataArea, rangeAxisState.getTicks());
3075            drawZeroRangeBaseline(g2, dataArea);
3076        }
3077        }
3078
3079        private void anchor_extracted(Point2D anchor, Rectangle2D dataArea, PlotOrientation orient,
3080                        CrosshairState crosshairState) {
3081                if (anchor != null) {
3082            ValueAxis domainAxis = getDomainAxis();
3083            if (domainAxis != null) {
3084                double x;
3085                if (orient == PlotOrientation.VERTICAL) {
3086                    x = domainAxis.java2DToValue(anchor.getX(), dataArea,
3087                            getDomainAxisEdge());
3088                }
3089                else {
3090                    x = domainAxis.java2DToValue(anchor.getY(), dataArea,
3091                            getDomainAxisEdge());
3092                }
3093                crosshairState.setAnchorX(x);
3094            }
3095            ValueAxis rangeAxis = getRangeAxis();
3096            if (rangeAxis != null) {
3097                double y;
3098                if (orient == PlotOrientation.VERTICAL) {
3099                    y = rangeAxis.java2DToValue(anchor.getY(), dataArea,
3100                            getRangeAxisEdge());
3101                }
3102                else {
3103                    y = rangeAxis.java2DToValue(anchor.getX(), dataArea,
3104                            getRangeAxisEdge());
3105                }
3106                crosshairState.setAnchorY(y);
3107            }
3108        }
3109        }
3110
3111    /**
3112     * Returns the indices of the non-null datasets in the specified order.
3113     * 
3114     * @param order  the order ({@code null} not permitted).
3115     * 
3116     * @return The list of indices. 
3117     */
3118    private List<Integer> getDatasetIndices(DatasetRenderingOrder order) {
3119        List<Integer> result = new ArrayList<>();
3120        for (Entry<Integer, XYDataset<S>> entry : this.datasets.entrySet()) {
3121            if (entry.getValue() != null) {
3122                result.add(entry.getKey());
3123            }
3124        }
3125        Collections.sort(result);
3126        if (order == DatasetRenderingOrder.REVERSE) {
3127            Collections.reverse(result);
3128        }
3129        return result;
3130    }
3131    
3132    private List<Integer> getRendererIndices(DatasetRenderingOrder order) {
3133        List<Integer> result = new ArrayList<>();
3134        for (Entry<Integer, XYItemRenderer> entry : this.renderers.entrySet()) {
3135            if (entry.getValue() != null) {
3136                result.add(entry.getKey());
3137            }
3138        }
3139        Collections.sort(result);
3140        if (order == DatasetRenderingOrder.REVERSE) {
3141            Collections.reverse(result);
3142        }
3143        return result;        
3144    }
3145    
3146    /**
3147     * Draws the background for the plot.
3148     *
3149     * @param g2  the graphics device.
3150     * @param area  the area.
3151     */
3152    @Override
3153    public void drawBackground(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area) {
3154        fillBackground(g2, area, this.orientation);
3155        drawQuadrants(g2, area);
3156        drawBackgroundImage(g2, area);
3157    }
3158
3159    /**
3160     * Draws the quadrants.
3161     *
3162     * @param g2  the graphics device.
3163     * @param area  the area.
3164     *
3165     * @see #setQuadrantOrigin(Point2D)
3166     * @see #setQuadrantPaint(int, Paint)
3167     */
3168    protected void drawQuadrants(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area) {
3169        //  0 | 1
3170        //  --+--
3171        //  2 | 3
3172        boolean somethingToDraw = false;
3173
3174        ValueAxis xAxis = getDomainAxis();
3175        if (xAxis == null) {  // we can't draw quadrants without a valid x-axis
3176            return;
3177        }
3178        double x = xAxis.getRange().constrain(this.quadrantOrigin.getX());
3179        double xx = xAxis.valueToJava2D(x, area, getDomainAxisEdge());
3180
3181        ValueAxis yAxis = getRangeAxis();
3182        if (yAxis == null) {  // we can't draw quadrants without a valid y-axis
3183            return;
3184        }
3185        double y = yAxis.getRange().constrain(this.quadrantOrigin.getY());
3186        double yy = yAxis.valueToJava2D(y, area, getRangeAxisEdge());
3187
3188        double xmin = xAxis.getLowerBound();
3189        double xxmin = xAxis.valueToJava2D(xmin, area, getDomainAxisEdge());
3190
3191        double xmax = xAxis.getUpperBound();
3192        double xxmax = xAxis.valueToJava2D(xmax, area, getDomainAxisEdge());
3193
3194        double ymin = yAxis.getLowerBound();
3195        double yymin = yAxis.valueToJava2D(ymin, area, getRangeAxisEdge());
3196
3197        double ymax = yAxis.getUpperBound();
3198        double yymax = yAxis.valueToJava2D(ymax, area, getRangeAxisEdge());
3199
3200        Rectangle2D[] r = new Rectangle2D[] {null, null, null, null};
3201        if (this.quadrantPaint[0] != null) {
3202            if (x > xmin && y < ymax) {
3203                if (this.orientation == PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL) {
3204                    r[0] = new Rectangle2D.Double(Math.min(yymax, yy),
3205                            Math.min(xxmin, xx), Math.abs(yy - yymax),
3206                            Math.abs(xx - xxmin));
3207                }
3208                else {  // PlotOrientation.VERTICAL
3209                    r[0] = new Rectangle2D.Double(Math.min(xxmin, xx),
3210                            Math.min(yymax, yy), Math.abs(xx - xxmin),
3211                            Math.abs(yy - yymax));
3212                }
3213                somethingToDraw = true;
3214            }
3215        }
3216        if (this.quadrantPaint[1] != null) {
3217            if (x < xmax && y < ymax) {
3218                if (this.orientation == PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL) {
3219                    r[1] = new Rectangle2D.Double(Math.min(yymax, yy),
3220                            Math.min(xxmax, xx), Math.abs(yy - yymax),
3221                            Math.abs(xx - xxmax));
3222                }
3223                else {  // PlotOrientation.VERTICAL
3224                    r[1] = new Rectangle2D.Double(Math.min(xx, xxmax),
3225                            Math.min(yymax, yy), Math.abs(xx - xxmax),
3226                            Math.abs(yy - yymax));
3227                }
3228                somethingToDraw = true;
3229            }
3230        }
3231        if (this.quadrantPaint[2] != null) {
3232            if (x > xmin && y > ymin) {
3233                if (this.orientation == PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL) {
3234                    r[2] = new Rectangle2D.Double(Math.min(yymin, yy),
3235                            Math.min(xxmin, xx), Math.abs(yy - yymin),
3236                            Math.abs(xx - xxmin));
3237                }
3238                else {  // PlotOrientation.VERTICAL
3239                    r[2] = new Rectangle2D.Double(Math.min(xxmin, xx),
3240                            Math.min(yymin, yy), Math.abs(xx - xxmin),
3241                            Math.abs(yy - yymin));
3242                }
3243                somethingToDraw = true;
3244            }
3245        }
3246        if (this.quadrantPaint[3] != null) {
3247            if (x < xmax && y > ymin) {
3248                if (this.orientation == PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL) {
3249                    r[3] = new Rectangle2D.Double(Math.min(yymin, yy),
3250                            Math.min(xxmax, xx), Math.abs(yy - yymin),
3251                            Math.abs(xx - xxmax));
3252                }
3253                else {  // PlotOrientation.VERTICAL
3254                    r[3] = new Rectangle2D.Double(Math.min(xx, xxmax),
3255                            Math.min(yymin, yy), Math.abs(xx - xxmax),
3256                            Math.abs(yy - yymin));
3257                }
3258                somethingToDraw = true;
3259            }
3260        }
3261        if (somethingToDraw) {
3262            Composite originalComposite = g2.getComposite();
3263            g2.setComposite(AlphaComposite.getInstance(AlphaComposite.SRC_OVER,
3264                    getBackgroundAlpha()));
3265            for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
3266                if (this.quadrantPaint[i] != null && r[i] != null) {
3267                    g2.setPaint(this.quadrantPaint[i]);
3268                    g2.fill(r[i]);
3269                }
3270            }
3271            g2.setComposite(originalComposite);
3272        }
3273    }
3274
3275    /**
3276     * Draws the domain tick bands, if any.
3277     *
3278     * @param g2  the graphics device.
3279     * @param dataArea  the data area.
3280     * @param ticks  the ticks.
3281     *
3282     * @see #setDomainTickBandPaint(Paint)
3283     */
3284    public void drawDomainTickBands(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D dataArea,
3285                                    List<ValueTick> ticks) {
3286        Paint bandPaint = getDomainTickBandPaint();
3287        if (bandPaint != null) {
3288            boolean fillBand = false;
3289            ValueAxis xAxis = getDomainAxis();
3290            double previous = xAxis.getLowerBound();
3291            for (ValueTick tick : ticks) {
3292                double current = tick.getValue();
3293                if (fillBand) {
3294                    getRenderer().fillDomainGridBand(g2, this, xAxis, dataArea,
3295                            previous, current);
3296                }
3297                previous = current;
3298                fillBand = !fillBand;
3299            }
3300            double end = xAxis.getUpperBound();
3301            if (fillBand) {
3302                getRenderer().fillDomainGridBand(g2, this, xAxis, dataArea,
3303                        previous, end);
3304            }
3305        }
3306    }
3307
3308    /**
3309     * Draws the range tick bands, if any.
3310     *
3311     * @param g2  the graphics device.
3312     * @param dataArea  the data area.
3313     * @param ticks  the ticks.
3314     *
3315     * @see #setRangeTickBandPaint(Paint)
3316     */
3317    public void drawRangeTickBands(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D dataArea,
3318                                   List<ValueTick> ticks) {
3319        Paint bandPaint = getRangeTickBandPaint();
3320        if (bandPaint != null) {
3321            boolean fillBand = false;
3322            ValueAxis axis = getRangeAxis();
3323            double previous = axis.getLowerBound();
3324            for (ValueTick tick : ticks) {
3325                double current = tick.getValue();
3326                if (fillBand) {
3327                    getRenderer().fillRangeGridBand(g2, this, axis, dataArea,
3328                            previous, current);
3329                }
3330                previous = current;
3331                fillBand = !fillBand;
3332            }
3333            double end = axis.getUpperBound();
3334            if (fillBand) {
3335                getRenderer().fillRangeGridBand(g2, this, axis, dataArea,
3336                        previous, end);
3337            }
3338        }
3339    }
3340
3341    /**
3342     * A utility method for drawing the axes.
3343     *
3344     * @param g2  the graphics device ({@code null} not permitted).
3345     * @param plotArea  the plot area ({@code null} not permitted).
3346     * @param dataArea  the data area ({@code null} not permitted).
3347     * @param plotState  collects information about the plot ({@code null}
3348     *                   permitted).
3349     *
3350     * @return A map containing the state for each axis drawn.
3351     */
3352    protected Map<Axis, AxisState> drawAxes(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D plotArea,
3353            Rectangle2D dataArea, PlotRenderingInfo plotState) {
3354
3355        AxisCollection axisCollection = new AxisCollection();
3356
3357        // add domain axes to lists...
3358        for (ValueAxis axis : this.domainAxes.values()) {
3359            if (axis != null) {
3360                int axisIndex = findDomainAxisIndex(axis);
3361                axisCollection.add(axis, getDomainAxisEdge(axisIndex));
3362            }
3363        }
3364
3365        // add range axes to lists...
3366        for (ValueAxis axis : this.rangeAxes.values()) {
3367            if (axis != null) {
3368                int axisIndex = findRangeAxisIndex(axis);
3369                axisCollection.add(axis, getRangeAxisEdge(axisIndex));
3370            }
3371        }
3372
3373        Map<Axis, AxisState> axisStateMap = new HashMap<>();
3374
3375        // draw the top axes
3376        double cursor = dataArea.getMinY() - this.axisOffset.calculateTopOutset(
3377                dataArea.getHeight());
3378        for (Axis axis : axisCollection.getAxesAtTop()) {
3379            AxisState info = axis.draw(g2, cursor, plotArea, dataArea,
3380                    RectangleEdge.TOP, plotState);
3381            cursor = info.getCursor();
3382            axisStateMap.put(axis, info);
3383        }
3384
3385        // draw the bottom axes
3386        cursor = dataArea.getMaxY()
3387                 + this.axisOffset.calculateBottomOutset(dataArea.getHeight());
3388        for (Axis axis : axisCollection.getAxesAtBottom()) {
3389            AxisState info = axis.draw(g2, cursor, plotArea, dataArea,
3390                    RectangleEdge.BOTTOM, plotState);
3391            cursor = info.getCursor();
3392            axisStateMap.put(axis, info);
3393        }
3394
3395        // draw the left axes
3396        cursor = dataArea.getMinX()
3397                 - this.axisOffset.calculateLeftOutset(dataArea.getWidth());
3398        for (Axis axis : axisCollection.getAxesAtLeft()) {
3399            AxisState info = axis.draw(g2, cursor, plotArea, dataArea,
3400                    RectangleEdge.LEFT, plotState);
3401            cursor = info.getCursor();
3402            axisStateMap.put(axis, info);
3403        }
3404
3405        // draw the right axes
3406        cursor = dataArea.getMaxX()
3407                 + this.axisOffset.calculateRightOutset(dataArea.getWidth());
3408        for (Axis axis : axisCollection.getAxesAtRight()) {
3409            AxisState info = axis.draw(g2, cursor, plotArea, dataArea,
3410                    RectangleEdge.RIGHT, plotState);
3411            cursor = info.getCursor();
3412            axisStateMap.put(axis, info);
3413        }
3414
3415        return axisStateMap;
3416    }
3417
3418    /**
3419     * Draws a representation of the data within the dataArea region, using the
3420     * current renderer.
3421     * <P>
3422     * The {@code info} and {@code crosshairState} arguments may be
3423     * {@code null}.
3424     *
3425     * @param g2  the graphics device.
3426     * @param dataArea  the region in which the data is to be drawn.
3427     * @param index  the dataset index.
3428     * @param info  an optional object for collection dimension information.
3429     * @param crosshairState  collects crosshair information
3430     *                        ({@code null} permitted).
3431     *
3432     * @return A flag that indicates whether any data was actually rendered.
3433     */
3434    public boolean render(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D dataArea, int index,
3435            PlotRenderingInfo info, CrosshairState crosshairState) {
3436
3437        boolean foundData = false;
3438        XYDataset<S> dataset = getDataset(index);
3439        if (!DatasetUtils.isEmptyOrNull(dataset)) {
3440            foundData = true;
3441            ValueAxis xAxis = getDomainAxisForDataset(index);
3442            ValueAxis yAxis = getRangeAxisForDataset(index);
3443            if (xAxis == null || yAxis == null) {
3444                return foundData;  // can't render anything without axes
3445            }
3446            XYItemRenderer renderer = getRenderer(index);
3447            if (renderer == null) {
3448                renderer = getRenderer();
3449                if (renderer == null) { // no default renderer available
3450                    return foundData;
3451                }
3452            }
3453
3454            XYItemRendererState state = renderer.initialise(g2, dataArea, this,
3455                    dataset, info);
3456            int passCount = renderer.getPassCount();
3457
3458            SeriesRenderingOrder seriesOrder = getSeriesRenderingOrder();
3459            if (seriesOrder == SeriesRenderingOrder.REVERSE) {
3460                //render series in reverse order
3461                for (int pass = 0; pass < passCount; pass++) {
3462                    int seriesCount = dataset.getSeriesCount();
3463                    for (int series = seriesCount - 1; series >= 0; series--) {
3464                        int firstItem = 0;
3465                        int lastItem = dataset.getItemCount(series) - 1;
3466                        if (lastItem == -1) {
3467                            continue;
3468                        }
3469                        if (state.getProcessVisibleItemsOnly()) {
3470                            int[] itemBounds = RendererUtils.findLiveItems(
3471                                    dataset, series, xAxis.getLowerBound(),
3472                                    xAxis.getUpperBound());
3473                            firstItem = Math.max(itemBounds[0] - 1, 0);
3474                            lastItem = Math.min(itemBounds[1] + 1, lastItem);
3475                        }
3476                        state.startSeriesPass(dataset, series, firstItem,
3477                                lastItem, pass, passCount);
3478                        for (int item = firstItem; item <= lastItem; item++) {
3479                            renderer.drawItem(g2, state, dataArea, info,
3480                                    this, xAxis, yAxis, dataset, series, item,
3481                                    crosshairState, pass);
3482                        }
3483                        state.endSeriesPass(dataset, series, firstItem,
3484                                lastItem, pass, passCount);
3485                    }
3486                }
3487            }
3488            else {
3489                //render series in forward order
3490                for (int pass = 0; pass < passCount; pass++) {
3491                    int seriesCount = dataset.getSeriesCount();
3492                    for (int series = 0; series < seriesCount; series++) {
3493                        int firstItem = 0;
3494                        int lastItem = dataset.getItemCount(series) - 1;
3495                        if (state.getProcessVisibleItemsOnly()) {
3496                            int[] itemBounds = RendererUtils.findLiveItems(
3497                                    dataset, series, xAxis.getLowerBound(),
3498                                    xAxis.getUpperBound());
3499                            firstItem = Math.max(itemBounds[0] - 1, 0);
3500                            lastItem = Math.min(itemBounds[1] + 1, lastItem);
3501                        }
3502                        state.startSeriesPass(dataset, series, firstItem,
3503                                lastItem, pass, passCount);
3504                        for (int item = firstItem; item <= lastItem; item++) {
3505                            renderer.drawItem(g2, state, dataArea, info,
3506                                    this, xAxis, yAxis, dataset, series, item,
3507                                    crosshairState, pass);
3508                        }
3509                        state.endSeriesPass(dataset, series, firstItem,
3510                                lastItem, pass, passCount);
3511                    }
3512                }
3513            }
3514        }
3515        return foundData;
3516    }
3517
3518    /**
3519     * Returns the domain axis for a dataset.
3520     *
3521     * @param index  the dataset index (must be &gt;= 0).
3522     *
3523     * @return The axis.
3524     */
3525    public ValueAxis getDomainAxisForDataset(int index) {
3526        Args.requireNonNegative(index, "index");
3527        ValueAxis valueAxis;
3528        List<Integer> axisIndices = this.datasetToDomainAxesMap.get(index);
3529        if (axisIndices != null) {
3530            // the first axis in the list is used for data <--> Java2D
3531            Integer axisIndex = axisIndices.get(0);
3532            valueAxis = getDomainAxis(axisIndex);
3533        }
3534        else {
3535            valueAxis = getDomainAxis(0);
3536        }
3537        return valueAxis;
3538    }
3539

3544     *
3545     * @return The axis.
3546     */
3547    public ValueAxis getRangeAxisForDataset(int index) {
3548        Args.requireNonNegative(index, "index");
3549        ValueAxis valueAxis;
3550        List<Integer> axisIndices = this.datasetToRangeAxesMap.get(index);
3551        if (axisIndices != null) {
3552            // the first axis in the list is used for data <--> Java2D
3553            Integer axisIndex = axisIndices.get(0);
3554            valueAxis = getRangeAxis(axisIndex);
3555        }
3556        else {
3557            valueAxis = getRangeAxis(0);
3558        }
3559        return valueAxis;
3560    }

3562    /**
3563     * Draws the gridlines for the plot, if they are visible.
3564     *
3565     * @param g2  the graphics device.
3566     * @param dataArea  the data area.
3567     * @param ticks  the ticks.
3568     *
3569     * @see #drawRangeGridlines(Graphics2D, Rectangle2D, List)
3570     */
3571    protected void drawDomainGridlines(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D dataArea,
3572                                       List<ValueTick> ticks) {
3573
3574        // no renderer, no gridlines...
3575        if (getRenderer() == null) {
3576            return;
3577        }
3578
3579        // draw the domain grid lines, if any...
3580        if (isDomainGridlinesVisible() || isDomainMinorGridlinesVisible()) {
3581            Stroke gridStroke = null;
3582            Paint gridPaint = null;
3583            for (ValueTick tick : ticks) {
3584                boolean paintLine = false;
3585                if ((tick.getTickType() == TickType.MINOR)
3586                        && isDomainMinorGridlinesVisible()) {
3587                    gridStroke = getDomainMinorGridlineStroke();
3588                    gridPaint = getDomainMinorGridlinePaint();
3589                    paintLine = true;
3590                } else if ((tick.getTickType() == TickType.MAJOR)
3591                        && isDomainGridlinesVisible()) {
3592                    gridStroke = getDomainGridlineStroke();
3593                    gridPaint = getDomainGridlinePaint();
3594                    paintLine = true;
3595                }
3596                XYItemRenderer r = getRenderer();
3597                if ((r instanceof AbstractXYItemRenderer) && paintLine) {
3598                    ((AbstractXYItemRenderer) r).drawDomainLine(g2, this,
3599                            getDomainAxis(), dataArea, tick.getValue(),
3600                            gridPaint, gridStroke);
3601                }
3602            }
3603        }
3604    }
3605
3606    /**
3607     * Draws the gridlines for the plot's primary range axis, if they are
3608     * visible.
3609     *
3610     * @param g2  the graphics device.
3611     * @param area  the data area.
3612     * @param ticks  the ticks.
3613     *
3614     * @see #drawDomainGridlines(Graphics2D, Rectangle2D, List)
3615     */
3616    protected void drawRangeGridlines(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area,
3617                                      List<ValueTick> ticks) {
3618
3619        // no renderer, no gridlines...
3620        if (getRenderer() == null) {
3621            return;
3622        }
3623
3624        // draw the range grid lines, if any...
3625        if (isRangeGridlinesVisible() || isRangeMinorGridlinesVisible()) {
3626            Stroke gridStroke = null;
3627            Paint gridPaint = null;
3628            ValueAxis axis = getRangeAxis();
3629            if (axis != null) {
3630                for (ValueTick tick : ticks) {
3631                     boolean paintLine = false;
3632                    if ((tick.getTickType() == TickType.MINOR)
3633                            && isRangeMinorGridlinesVisible()) {
3634                        gridStroke = getRangeMinorGridlineStroke();
3635                        gridPaint = getRangeMinorGridlinePaint();
3636                        paintLine = true;
3637                    } else if ((tick.getTickType() == TickType.MAJOR)
3638                            && isRangeGridlinesVisible()) {
3639                        gridStroke = getRangeGridlineStroke();
3640                        gridPaint = getRangeGridlinePaint();
3641                        paintLine = true;
3642                    }
3643                    if ((tick.getValue() != 0.0
3644                            || !isRangeZeroBaselineVisible()) && paintLine) {
3645                        getRenderer().drawRangeLine(g2, this, getRangeAxis(),
3646                                area, tick.getValue(), gridPaint, gridStroke);
3647                    }
3648                }
3649            }
3650        }
3651    }

3691    public void drawAnnotations(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D dataArea,

3702    /**
3703     * Draws the domain markers (if any) for an axis and layer.  This method is
3704     * typically called from within the draw() method.
3705     *
3706     * @param g2  the graphics device.
3707     * @param dataArea  the data area.
3708     * @param index  the dataset/renderer index.
3709     * @param layer  the layer (foreground or background).
3710     */
3711    protected void drawDomainMarkers(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D dataArea,
3712                                     int index, Layer layer) {
3713
3714        XYItemRenderer r = getRenderer(index);
3715        if (r == null) {
3716            return;
3717        }
3718        // check that the renderer has a corresponding dataset (it doesn't
3719        // matter if the dataset is null)
3720        if (index >= getDatasetCount()) {
3721            return;
3722        }
3723        Collection<Marker> markers = getDomainMarkers(index, layer);
3724        ValueAxis axis = getDomainAxisForDataset(index);
3725        if (markers != null && axis != null) {
3726            for (Marker marker : markers) {
3727                r.drawDomainMarker(g2, this, axis, marker, dataArea);
3728            }
3729        }
3730
3731    }
3732
3733    /**
3734     * Draws the range markers (if any) for a renderer and layer.  This method
3735     * is typically called from within the draw() method.
3736     *
3737     * @param g2  the graphics device.
3738     * @param dataArea  the data area.
3739     * @param index  the renderer index.
3740     * @param layer  the layer (foreground or background).
3741     */
3742    protected void drawRangeMarkers(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D dataArea,
3743                                    int index, Layer layer) {
3744
3745        XYItemRenderer r = getRenderer(index);
3746        if (r == null) {
3747            return;
3748        }
3749        // check that the renderer has a corresponding dataset (it doesn't
3750        // matter if the dataset is null)
3751        if (index >= getDatasetCount()) {
3752            return;
3753        }
3754        Collection<Marker> markers = getRangeMarkers(index, layer);
3755        ValueAxis axis = getRangeAxisForDataset(index);
3756        if (markers != null && axis != null) {
3757            for (Marker marker : markers) {
3758                r.drawRangeMarker(g2, this, axis, marker, dataArea);
3759            }
3760        }
3761    }

3789    /**
3790     * Returns a collection of domain markers for a particular renderer and
3791     * layer.
3792     *
3793     * @param index  the renderer index.
3794     * @param layer  the layer.
3795     *
3796     * @return A collection of markers (possibly {@code null}).
3797     *
3798     * @see #getRangeMarkers(int, Layer)
3799     */
3800    public Collection<Marker> getDomainMarkers(int index, Layer layer) {
3801        Collection<Marker> result = null;
3802        if (layer == Layer.FOREGROUND) {
3803            result = this.foregroundDomainMarkers.get(index);
3804        }
3805        else if (layer == Layer.BACKGROUND) {
3806            result = this.backgroundDomainMarkers.get(index);
3807        }
3808        if (result != null) {
3809            result = Collections.unmodifiableCollection(result);
3810        }
3811        return result;
3812    }
3813

3816     * layer.
3817     *

3821     * @return A collection of markers (possibly {@code null}).
3822     *
3823     * @see #getDomainMarkers(int, Layer)
3824     */
3825    public Collection<Marker> getRangeMarkers(int index, Layer layer) {

3828            result = this.foregroundRangeMarkers.get(index);
3829        }
3830        else if (layer == Layer.BACKGROUND) {
3831            result = this.backgroundRangeMarkers.get(index);
3832        }
3833        if (result != null) {
3834            result = Collections.unmodifiableCollection(result);
3835        }
3836        return result;
3837    }

3839    /**
3840     * Utility method for drawing a horizontal line across the data area of the
3841     * plot.
3842     *
3843     * @param g2  the graphics device.
3844     * @param dataArea  the data area.
3845     * @param value  the coordinate, where to draw the line.
3846     * @param stroke  the stroke to use.
3847     * @param paint  the paint to use.
3848     */
3849    protected void drawHorizontalLine(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D dataArea,
3850                                      double value, Stroke stroke,
3851                                      Paint paint) {
3852
3853        ValueAxis axis = getRangeAxis();
3854        if (getOrientation() == PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL) {
3855            axis = getDomainAxis();
3856        }
3857        if (axis.getRange().contains(value)) {
3858            double yy = axis.valueToJava2D(value, dataArea, RectangleEdge.LEFT);
3859            Line2D line = new Line2D.Double(dataArea.getMinX(), yy,
3860                    dataArea.getMaxX(), yy);
3861            g2.setStroke(stroke);
3862            g2.setPaint(paint);
3863            g2.draw(line);
3864        }
3865
3866    }
3867
3868    /**
3869     * Draws a domain crosshair.
3870     *
3871     * @param g2  the graphics target.
3872     * @param dataArea  the data area.
3873     * @param orientation  the plot orientation.
3874     * @param value  the crosshair value.
3875     * @param axis  the axis against which the value is measured.
3876     * @param stroke  the stroke used to draw the crosshair line.
3877     * @param paint  the paint used to draw the crosshair line.
3878     */
3879    protected void drawDomainCrosshair(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D dataArea,
3880            PlotOrientation orientation, double value, ValueAxis axis,
3881            Stroke stroke, Paint paint) {
3882
3883        if (!axis.getRange().contains(value)) {
3884            return;
3885        }
3886        Line2D line;
3887        if (orientation == PlotOrientation.VERTICAL) {
3888            double xx = axis.valueToJava2D(value, dataArea,
3889                    RectangleEdge.BOTTOM);
3890            line = new Line2D.Double(xx, dataArea.getMinY(), xx,
3891                    dataArea.getMaxY());
3892        } else {
3893            double yy = axis.valueToJava2D(value, dataArea,
3894                    RectangleEdge.LEFT);
3895            line = new Line2D.Double(dataArea.getMinX(), yy,
3896                    dataArea.getMaxX(), yy);
3897        }
3898        Object saved = g2.getRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_STROKE_CONTROL);
3899        g2.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_STROKE_CONTROL, 
3900                RenderingHints.VALUE_STROKE_NORMALIZE);
3901        g2.setStroke(stroke);
3902        g2.setPaint(paint);
3903        g2.draw(line);
3904        g2.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_STROKE_CONTROL, saved);
3905    }
3906

3908     * Utility method for drawing a vertical line on the data area of the plot.

3919        ValueAxis axis = getDomainAxis();

3921            axis = getRangeAxis();
3922        }
3923        if (axis.getRange().contains(value)) {
3924            double xx = axis.valueToJava2D(value, dataArea,
3925                    RectangleEdge.BOTTOM);
3926            Line2D line = new Line2D.Double(xx, dataArea.getMinY(), xx,
3927                    dataArea.getMaxY());
3928            g2.setStroke(stroke);

3930            g2.draw(line);
3931        }
3932
3933    }

3935    /**
3936     * Draws a range crosshair.
3937     *
3938     * @param g2  the graphics target.
3939     * @param dataArea  the data area.
3940     * @param orientation  the plot orientation.
3941     * @param value  the crosshair value.

3944     * @param paint  the paint used to draw the crosshair line.
3945     */
3946    protected void drawRangeCrosshair(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D dataArea,
3947            PlotOrientation orientation, double value, ValueAxis axis,
3948            Stroke stroke, Paint paint) {
3949
3950        if (!axis.getRange().contains(value)) {
3951            return;
3952        }
3953        Object saved = g2.getRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_STROKE_CONTROL);
3954        g2.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_STROKE_CONTROL, 
3955                RenderingHints.VALUE_STROKE_NORMALIZE);
3956        Line2D line;
3957        if (orientation == PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL) {
3958            double xx = axis.valueToJava2D(value, dataArea, 
3959                    RectangleEdge.BOTTOM);
3960            line = new Line2D.Double(xx, dataArea.getMinY(), xx,
3961                    dataArea.getMaxY());
3962        } else {
3963            double yy = axis.valueToJava2D(value, dataArea, RectangleEdge.LEFT);
3964            line = new Line2D.Double(dataArea.getMinX(), yy,
3965                    dataArea.getMaxX(), yy);
3966        }
3967        g2.setStroke(stroke);
3968        g2.setPaint(paint);
3969        g2.draw(line);
3970        g2.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_STROKE_CONTROL, saved);
3971    }
3972
3973    /**
3974     * Handles a 'click' on the plot by updating the anchor values.
3975     *
3976     * @param x  the x-coordinate, where the click occurred, in Java2D space.
3977     * @param y  the y-coordinate, where the click occurred, in Java2D space.
3978     * @param info  object containing information about the plot dimensions.
3979     */
3980    @Override
3981    public void handleClick(int x, int y, PlotRenderingInfo info) {
3982
3983        Rectangle2D dataArea = info.getDataArea();
3984        if (dataArea.contains(x, y)) {
3985            // set the anchor value for the horizontal axis...
3986            ValueAxis xaxis = getDomainAxis();
3987            if (xaxis != null) {
3988                double hvalue = xaxis.java2DToValue(x, info.getDataArea(),
3989                        getDomainAxisEdge());
3990                setDomainCrosshairValue(hvalue);
3991            }
3992
3993            // set the anchor value for the vertical axis...
3994            ValueAxis yaxis = getRangeAxis();
3995            if (yaxis != null) {
3996                double vvalue = yaxis.java2DToValue(y, info.getDataArea(),
3997                        getRangeAxisEdge());
3998                setRangeCrosshairValue(vvalue);
3999            }
4000        }
4001    }
4002
4003    /**
4004     * A utility method that returns a list of datasets that are mapped to a
4005     * particular axis.
4006     *
4007     * @param axisIndex  the axis index ({@code null} not permitted).
4008     *
4009     * @return A list of datasets.
4010     */
4011    private List<XYDataset<S>> getDatasetsMappedToDomainAxis(Integer axisIndex) {
4012        Args.nullNotPermitted(axisIndex, "axisIndex");
4013        List<XYDataset<S>> result = new ArrayList<>();
4014        for (Entry<Integer, XYDataset<S>> entry : this.datasets.entrySet()) {
4015            int index = entry.getKey();
4016            List<Integer> mappedAxes = this.datasetToDomainAxesMap.get(index);
4017            if (mappedAxes == null) {
4018                if (axisIndex.equals(ZERO)) {
4019                    result.add(entry.getValue());
4020                }
4021            } else {
4022                if (mappedAxes.contains(axisIndex)) {
4023                    result.add(entry.getValue());
4024                }
4025            }
4026        }
4027        return result;
4028    }
4029
4030    /**
4031     * A utility method that returns a list of datasets that are mapped to a
4032     * particular axis.
4033     *
4034     * @param axisIndex  the axis index ({@code null} not permitted).
4035     *
4036     * @return A list of datasets.
4037     */
4038    private List<XYDataset<S>> getDatasetsMappedToRangeAxis(Integer axisIndex) {
4039        Args.nullNotPermitted(axisIndex, "axisIndex");
4040        List<XYDataset<S>> result = new ArrayList<>();
4041        for (Entry<Integer, XYDataset<S>> entry : this.datasets.entrySet()) {
4042            int index = entry.getKey();
4043            List<Integer> mappedAxes = this.datasetToRangeAxesMap.get(index);
4044            if (mappedAxes == null) {
4045                if (axisIndex.equals(ZERO)) {
4046                    result.add(entry.getValue());
4047                }
4048            } else {
4049                if (mappedAxes.contains(axisIndex)) {
4050                    result.add(entry.getValue());
4051                }
4052            }
4053        }
4054        return result;
4055    }
4056
4057    /**
4058     * Returns the index of the given domain axis.
4059     *
4060     * @param axis  the axis.
4061     *
4062     * @return The axis index.
4063     *
4064     * @see #getRangeAxisIndex(ValueAxis)
4065     */
4066    public int getDomainAxisIndex(ValueAxis axis) {
4067        int result = findDomainAxisIndex(axis);
4068        if (result < 0) {
4069            // try the parent plot
4070            Plot parent = getParent();
4071            if (parent instanceof XYPlot) {
4072                @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
4073                XYPlot<S> p = (XYPlot) parent;
4074                result = p.getDomainAxisIndex(axis);
4075            }
4076        }
4077        return result;
4078    }
4079    
4080    private int findDomainAxisIndex(ValueAxis axis) {
4081        for (Map.Entry<Integer, ValueAxis> entry : this.domainAxes.entrySet()) {
4082            if (entry.getValue() == axis) {
4083                return entry.getKey();
4084            }
4085        }
4086        return -1;
4087    }
4088
4089    /**
4090     * Returns the index of the given range axis.
4091     *
4092     * @param axis  the axis.
4093     *
4094     * @return The axis index.
4095     *
4096     * @see #getDomainAxisIndex(ValueAxis)
4097     */
4098    public int getRangeAxisIndex(ValueAxis axis) {
4099        int result = findRangeAxisIndex(axis);
4100        if (result < 0) {
4101            // try the parent plot
4102            Plot parent = getParent();
4103            if (parent instanceof XYPlot) {
4104                @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
4105                XYPlot<S> p = (XYPlot) parent;
4106                result = p.getRangeAxisIndex(axis);
4107            }
4108        }
4109        return result;
4110    }
4111
4112    private int findRangeAxisIndex(ValueAxis axis) {
4113        for (Map.Entry<Integer, ValueAxis> entry : this.rangeAxes.entrySet()) {
4114            if (entry.getValue() == axis) {
4115                return entry.getKey();
4116            }
4117        }
4118        return -1;
4119    }
4120
4121    /**
4122     * Returns the range for the specified axis.
4123     *
4124     * @param axis  the axis.
4125     *
4126     * @return The range.
4127     */
4128    @Override
4129    public Range getDataRange(ValueAxis axis) {
4130
4131        Range result = null;
4132        List<XYDataset<S>> mappedDatasets = new ArrayList<>();
4133        List<XYAnnotation> includedAnnotations = new ArrayList<>();
4134        boolean isDomainAxis = true;
4135
4136        // is it a domain axis?
4137        int domainIndex = getDomainAxisIndex(axis);
4138        if (domainIndex >= 0) {
4139            isDomainAxis = true;
4140            mappedDatasets.addAll(getDatasetsMappedToDomainAxis(domainIndex));
4141            if (domainIndex == 0) {
4142                // grab the plot's annotations
4143                for (XYAnnotation annotation : this.annotations) {
4144                    if (annotation instanceof XYAnnotationBoundsInfo) {
4145                        includedAnnotations.add(annotation);
4146                    }
4147                }
4148            }
4149        }
4150
4151        // or is it a range axis?
4152        int rangeIndex = getRangeAxisIndex(axis);
4153        if (rangeIndex >= 0) {
4154            isDomainAxis = false;
4155            mappedDatasets.addAll(getDatasetsMappedToRangeAxis(rangeIndex));
4156            if (rangeIndex == 0) {
4157                for (XYAnnotation annotation : this.annotations) {
4158                    if (annotation instanceof XYAnnotationBoundsInfo) {
4159                        includedAnnotations.add(annotation);
4160                    }
4161                }
4162            }
4163        }
4164
4165        // iterate through the datasets that map to the axis and get the union
4166        // of the ranges.
4167        for (XYDataset<S> d : mappedDatasets) {
4168            if (d != null) {
4169                XYItemRenderer r = getRendererForDataset(d);
4170                if (isDomainAxis) {
4171                    if (r != null) {
4172                        result = Range.combine(result, r.findDomainBounds(d));
4173                    }
4174                    else {
4175                        result = Range.combine(result,
4176                                DatasetUtils.findDomainBounds(d));
4177                    }
4178                }
4179                else {
4180                    if (r != null) {
4181                        result = Range.combine(result, r.findRangeBounds(d));
4182                    }
4183                    else {
4184                        result = Range.combine(result,
4185                                DatasetUtils.findRangeBounds(d));
4186                    }
4187                }
4188                if (r != null) {
4189                    for (XYAnnotation annotation : r.getAnnotations()) {
4190                        if (annotation instanceof XYAnnotationBoundsInfo) {
4191                            includedAnnotations.add(annotation);
4192                        }
4193                    }
4194                }
4195            }
4196        }
4197
4198        for (XYAnnotation includedAnnotation : includedAnnotations) {
4199            XYAnnotationBoundsInfo xyabi = (XYAnnotationBoundsInfo) includedAnnotation;
4200            if (xyabi.getIncludeInDataBounds()) {
4201                if (isDomainAxis) {
4202                    result = Range.combine(result, xyabi.getXRange());
4203                }
4204                else {
4205                    result = Range.combine(result, xyabi.getYRange());
4206                }
4207            }
4208        }
4209        return result;
4210    }
4211
4212    /**
4213     * Receives notification of a change to an {@link Annotation} added to
4214     * this plot.
4215     *
4216     * @param event  information about the event (not used here).
4217     */
4218    @Override
4219    public void annotationChanged(AnnotationChangeEvent event) {
4220        if (getParent() != null) {
4221            getParent().annotationChanged(event);
4222        }
4223        else {
4224            PlotChangeEvent e = new PlotChangeEvent(this);
4225            notifyListeners(e);
4226        }
4227    }
4228
4229    /**
4230     * Receives notification of a change to the plot's dataset.
4231     * <P>
4232     * The axis ranges are updated if necessary.
4233     *
4234     * @param event  information about the event (not used here).
4235     */
4236    @Override
4237    public void datasetChanged(DatasetChangeEvent event) {
4238        configureDomainAxes();
4239        configureRangeAxes();
4240        if (getParent() != null) {
4241            getParent().datasetChanged(event);
4242        }
4243        else {
4244            PlotChangeEvent e = new PlotChangeEvent(this);
4245            e.setType(ChartChangeEventType.DATASET_UPDATED);
4246            notifyListeners(e);
4247        }
4248    }
4249
4250    /**
4251     * Receives notification of a renderer change event.
4252     *
4253     * @param event  the event.
4254     */
4255    @Override
4256    public void rendererChanged(RendererChangeEvent event) {
4257        // if the event was caused by a change to series visibility, then
4258        // the axis ranges might need updating...
4259        if (event.getSeriesVisibilityChanged()) {
4260            configureDomainAxes();
4261            configureRangeAxes();
4262        }
4263        fireChangeEvent();
4264    }

4659     * domain axes.

4667    /**
4668     * Returns {@code true} if panning is enabled for the range axis/axes,
4669     * and {@code false} otherwise.  The default value is {@code false}.
4670     *
4671     * @return A boolean.
4672     */
4673    @Override
4674    public boolean isRangePannable() {
4675        return this.rangePannable;
4676    }

4679     * Sets the flag that enables or disables panning of the plot along
4680     * the range axis/axes.
4681     *
4682     * @param pannable  the new flag value.
4683     */
4684    public void setRangePannable(boolean pannable) {
4685        this.rangePannable = pannable;

4687
4688    /**
4689     * Pans the domain axes by the specified percentage.
4690     *
4691     * @param percent  the distance to pan (as a percentage of the axis length).
4692     * @param info the plot info
4693     * @param source the source point where the pan action started.
4694     */
4695    @Override
4696    public void panDomainAxes(double percent, PlotRenderingInfo info,
4697            Point2D source) {
4698        if (!isDomainPannable()) {
4699            return;
4700        }
4701        int domainAxisCount = getDomainAxisCount();
4702        for (int i = 0; i < domainAxisCount; i++) {
4703            ValueAxis axis = getDomainAxis(i);
4704            if (axis == null) {
4705                continue;
4706            }
4707
4708            axis.pan(axis.isInverted() ? -percent : percent);
4709        }
4710    }
4711
4712    /**
4713     * Pans the range axes by the specified percentage.
4714     *
4715     * @param percent  the distance to pan (as a percentage of the axis length).
4716     * @param info the plot info
4717     * @param source the source point where the pan action started.
4718     */
4719    @Override
4720    public void panRangeAxes(double percent, PlotRenderingInfo info,
4721            Point2D source) {
4722        if (!isRangePannable()) {
4723            return;
4724        }
4725        int rangeAxisCount = getRangeAxisCount();
4726        for (int i = 0; i < rangeAxisCount; i++) {
4727            ValueAxis axis = getRangeAxis(i);
4728            if (axis == null) {
4729                continue;
4730            }
4731
4732            axis.pan(axis.isInverted() ? -percent : percent);
4733        }
4734    }
4735
4736    /**
4737     * Multiplies the range on the domain axis/axes by the specified factor.
4738     *
4739     * @param factor  the zoom factor.
4740     * @param info  the plot rendering info.
4741     * @param source  the source point (in Java2D space).
4742     *
4743     * @see #zoomRangeAxes(double, PlotRenderingInfo, Point2D)
4744     */
4745    @Override
4746    public void zoomDomainAxes(double factor, PlotRenderingInfo info,
4747                               Point2D source) {
4748        // delegate to other method
4749        zoomDomainAxes(factor, info, source, false);
4750    }
4751
4752    /**
4753     * Multiplies the range on the domain axis/axes by the specified factor.
4754     *
4755     * @param factor  the zoom factor.
4756     * @param info  the plot rendering info.
4757     * @param source  the source point (in Java2D space).
4758     * @param useAnchor  use source point as zoom anchor?
4759     *
4760     * @see #zoomRangeAxes(double, PlotRenderingInfo, Point2D, boolean)
4761     */
4762    @Override
4763    public void zoomDomainAxes(double factor, PlotRenderingInfo info,
4764                               Point2D source, boolean useAnchor) {
4765
4766        // perform the zoom on each domain axis
4767        for (ValueAxis xAxis : this.domainAxes.values()) {
4768            if (xAxis == null) {
4769                continue;
4770            }
4771            if (useAnchor) {
4772                // get the relevant source coordinate given the plot orientation
4773                double sourceX = source.getX();
4774                if (this.orientation == PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL) {
4775                    sourceX = source.getY();
4776                }
4777                double anchorX = xAxis.java2DToValue(sourceX,
4778                        info.getDataArea(), getDomainAxisEdge());
4779                xAxis.resizeRange2(factor, anchorX);
4780            } else {
4781                xAxis.resizeRange(factor);
4782            }
4783        }
4784    }
4785
4786    /**
4787     * Zooms in on the domain axis/axes.  The new lower and upper bounds are
4788     * specified as percentages of the current axis range, where 0 percent is
4789     * the current lower bound and 100 percent is the current upper bound.
4790     *
4791     * @param lowerPercent  a percentage that determines the new lower bound
4792     *                      for the axis (e.g. 0.20 is twenty percent).
4793     * @param upperPercent  a percentage that determines the new upper bound
4794     *                      for the axis (e.g. 0.80 is eighty percent).
4795     * @param info  the plot rendering info.
4796     * @param source  the source point (ignored).
4797     *
4798     * @see #zoomRangeAxes(double, double, PlotRenderingInfo, Point2D)
4799     */
4800    @Override
4801    public void zoomDomainAxes(double lowerPercent, double upperPercent,
4802                               PlotRenderingInfo info, Point2D source) {
4803        for (ValueAxis xAxis : this.domainAxes.values()) {
4804            if (xAxis != null) {
4805                xAxis.zoomRange(lowerPercent, upperPercent);
4806            }
4807        }
4808    }
4809
4810    /**
4811     * Multiplies the range on the range axis/axes by the specified factor.
4812     *
4813     * @param factor  the zoom factor.
4814     * @param info  the plot rendering info.
4815     * @param source  the source point.
4816     *
4817     * @see #zoomDomainAxes(double, PlotRenderingInfo, Point2D, boolean)
4818     */
4819    @Override
4820    public void zoomRangeAxes(double factor, PlotRenderingInfo info,
4821                              Point2D source) {
4822        // delegate to other method
4823        zoomRangeAxes(factor, info, source, false);
4824    }
4825
4826    /**
4827     * Multiplies the range on the range axis/axes by the specified factor.
4828     *
4829     * @param factor  the zoom factor.
4830     * @param info  the plot rendering info.
4831     * @param source  the source point.
4832     * @param useAnchor  a flag that controls whether or not the source point
4833     *         is used for the zoom anchor.
4834     *
4835     * @see #zoomDomainAxes(double, PlotRenderingInfo, Point2D, boolean)
4836     */
4837    @Override
4838    public void zoomRangeAxes(double factor, PlotRenderingInfo info,
4839                              Point2D source, boolean useAnchor) {
4840
4841        // perform the zoom on each range axis
4842        for (ValueAxis yAxis : this.rangeAxes.values()) {
4843            if (yAxis == null) {
4844                continue;
4845            }
4846            if (useAnchor) {
4847                // get the relevant source coordinate given the plot orientation
4848                double sourceY = source.getY();
4849                if (this.orientation == PlotOrientation.HORIZONTAL) {
4850                    sourceY = source.getX();
4851                }
4852                double anchorY = yAxis.java2DToValue(sourceY,
4853                        info.getDataArea(), getRangeAxisEdge());
4854                yAxis.resizeRange2(factor, anchorY);
4855            } else {
4856                yAxis.resizeRange(factor);
4857            }
4858        }
4859    }
4860
4861    /**
4862     * Zooms in on the range axes.
4863     *
4864     * @param lowerPercent  the lower bound.
4865     * @param upperPercent  the upper bound.
4866     * @param info  the plot rendering info.
4867     * @param source  the source point.
4868     *
4869     * @see #zoomDomainAxes(double, double, PlotRenderingInfo, Point2D)
4870     */
4871    @Override
4872    public void zoomRangeAxes(double lowerPercent, double upperPercent,
4873                              PlotRenderingInfo info, Point2D source) {
4874        for (ValueAxis yAxis : this.rangeAxes.values()) {
4875            if (yAxis != null) {
4876                yAxis.zoomRange(lowerPercent, upperPercent);
4877            }
4878        }
4879    }
4880
4881    /**
4882     * Returns {@code true}, indicating that the domain axis/axes for this
4883     * plot are zoomable.
4884     *
4885     * @return A boolean.
4886     *
4887     * @see #isRangeZoomable()
4888     */
4889    @Override
4890    public boolean isDomainZoomable() {
4891        return true;
4892    }

4895     * Returns {@code true}, indicating that the range axis/axes for this
4896     * plot are zoomable.
4897     *
4898     * @return A boolean.
4899     *
4900     * @see #isDomainZoomable()
4901     */
4902    @Override
4903    public boolean isRangeZoomable() {
4904        return true;
4905    }

4907    /**
4908     * Returns the number of series in the primary dataset for this plot.  If
4909     * the dataset is {@code null}, the method returns 0.
4910     *
4911     * @return The series count.
4912     */
4913    public int getSeriesCount() {
4914        int result = 0;
4915        XYDataset<S> dataset = getDataset();
4916        if (dataset != null) {
4917            result = dataset.getSeriesCount();
4918        }
4919        return result;
4920    }

4922    /**
4923     * Returns the fixed legend items, if any.
4924     *
4925     * @return The legend items (possibly {@code null}).
4926     *
4927     * @see #setFixedLegendItems(LegendItemCollection)
4928     */
4929    public LegendItemCollection getFixedLegendItems() {
4930        return this.fixedLegendItems;
4931    }
4932
4933    /**
4934     * Sets the fixed legend items for the plot.  Leave this set to
4935     * {@code null} if you prefer the legend items to be created
4936     * automatically.
4937     *
4938     * @param items  the legend items ({@code null} permitted).
4939     *
4940     * @see #getFixedLegendItems()
4941     */
4942    public void setFixedLegendItems(LegendItemCollection items) {
4943        this.fixedLegendItems = items;
4944        fireChangeEvent();
4945    }
4946
4947    /**
4948     * Returns the legend items for the plot.  Each legend item is generated by
4949     * the plot's renderer, since the renderer is responsible for the visual
4950     * representation of the data.
4951     *
4952     * @return The legend items.
4953     */
4954    @Override
4955    public LegendItemCollection getLegendItems() {
4956        if (this.fixedLegendItems != null) {
4957            return this.fixedLegendItems;
4958        }
4959        LegendItemCollection result = new LegendItemCollection();
4960        for (XYDataset<S> dataset : this.datasets.values()) {
4961            if (dataset == null) {
4962                continue;
4963            }
4964            int datasetIndex = indexOf(dataset);
4965            XYItemRenderer renderer = getRenderer(datasetIndex);
4966            if (renderer == null) {
4967                renderer = getRenderer(0);
4968            }
4969            if (renderer != null) {
4970                int seriesCount = dataset.getSeriesCount();
4971                for (int i = 0; i < seriesCount; i++) {
4972                    if (renderer.isSeriesVisible(i)
4973                            && renderer.isSeriesVisibleInLegend(i)) {
4974                        LegendItem item = renderer.getLegendItem(
4975                                datasetIndex, i);
4976                        if (item != null) {
4977                            result.add(item);
4978                        }
4979                    }
4980                }
4981            }
4982        }
4983        return result;
4984    }

4986    /**
4987     * Tests this plot for equality with another object.
4988     *
4989     * @param obj  the object ({@code null} permitted).
4990     *
4991     * @return {@code true} or {@code false}.
4992     */
4993    @Override
4994    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
4995        if (obj == this) {
4996            return true;
4997        }
4998        if (!(obj instanceof XYPlot)) {
4999            return false;
5000        }
5001        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
5002        XYPlot<S> that = (XYPlot) obj;
5003        if (this.weight != that.weight) {
5004            return false;
5005        }
5006        if (this.orientation != that.orientation) {
5007            return false;
5008        }
5009        if (!this.domainAxes.equals(that.domainAxes)) {
5010            return false;
5011        }
5012        if (!this.domainAxisLocations.equals(that.domainAxisLocations)) {
5013            return false;
5014        }
5015        if (this.rangeCrosshairLockedOnData
5016                != that.rangeCrosshairLockedOnData) {
5017            return false;
5018        }
5019        if (this.domainGridlinesVisible != that.domainGridlinesVisible) {
5020            return false;
5021        }
5022        if (this.rangeGridlinesVisible != that.rangeGridlinesVisible) {
5023            return false;
5024        }
5025        if (this.domainMinorGridlinesVisible
5026                != that.domainMinorGridlinesVisible) {
5027            return false;
5028        }
5029        if (this.rangeMinorGridlinesVisible
5030                != that.rangeMinorGridlinesVisible) {
5031            return false;
5032        }
5033        if (this.domainZeroBaselineVisible != that.domainZeroBaselineVisible) {
5034            return false;
5035        }
5036        if (this.rangeZeroBaselineVisible != that.rangeZeroBaselineVisible) {
5037            return false;
5038        }
5039        if (this.domainCrosshairVisible != that.domainCrosshairVisible) {
5040            return false;
5041        }
5042        if (this.domainCrosshairValue != that.domainCrosshairValue) {
5043            return false;
5044        }
5045        if (this.domainCrosshairLockedOnData
5046                != that.domainCrosshairLockedOnData) {
5047            return false;
5048        }
5049        if (this.rangeCrosshairVisible != that.rangeCrosshairVisible) {
5050            return false;
5051        }
5052        if (this.rangeCrosshairValue != that.rangeCrosshairValue) {
5053            return false;
5054        }
5055        if (!Objects.equals(this.axisOffset, that.axisOffset)) {
5056            return false;
5057        }
5058        if (!Objects.equals(this.renderers, that.renderers)) {
5059            return false;
5060        }
5061        if (!Objects.equals(this.rangeAxes, that.rangeAxes)) {
5062            return false;
5063        }
5064        if (!this.rangeAxisLocations.equals(that.rangeAxisLocations)) {
5065            return false;
5066        }
5067        if (!Objects.equals(this.datasetToDomainAxesMap, that.datasetToDomainAxesMap)) {
5068            return false;
5069        }
5070        if (!Objects.equals(this.datasetToRangeAxesMap, that.datasetToRangeAxesMap)) {
5071            return false;
5072        }
5073        if (!Objects.equals(this.domainGridlineStroke, that.domainGridlineStroke)) {
5074            return false;
5075        }

5077                that.domainGridlinePaint)) {
5078            return false;
5079        }
5080        if (!Objects.equals(this.rangeGridlineStroke, that.rangeGridlineStroke)) {
5081            return false;

5084                that.rangeGridlinePaint)) {
5085            return false;
5086        }

5091                that.domainMinorGridlinePaint)) {

5119                that.domainCrosshairPaint)) {
5120            return false;

5168            return false;

5170        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
5171            if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.quadrantPaint[i],
5172                    that.quadrantPaint[i])) {
5173                return false;
5174            }
5175        }
5176        if (!Objects.equals(this.shadowGenerator, that.shadowGenerator)) {
5177            return false;
5178        }
5179        return super.equals(obj);
5180    }
