5182    @Override
5183    public int hashCode()
5184    {
5185        int hash = 7;
5186        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.orientation);
5187        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.axisOffset);
5188        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.domainAxes);
5189        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.domainAxisLocations);
5190        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.rangeAxes);
5191        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.rangeAxisLocations);
5192        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.renderers);
5193        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.datasetToDomainAxesMap);
5194        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.datasetToRangeAxesMap);
5195        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.quadrantOrigin);
5196        hash = 43 * hash + Arrays.deepHashCode(this.quadrantPaint);
5197        hash = 43 * hash + (this.domainGridlinesVisible ? 1 : 0);
5198        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.domainGridlineStroke);
5199        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.domainGridlinePaint);
5200        hash = 43 * hash + (this.rangeGridlinesVisible ? 1 : 0);
5201        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.rangeGridlineStroke);
5202        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.rangeGridlinePaint);
5203        hash = 43 * hash + (this.domainMinorGridlinesVisible ? 1 : 0);
5204        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.domainMinorGridlineStroke);
5205        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.domainMinorGridlinePaint);
5206        hash = 43 * hash + (this.rangeMinorGridlinesVisible ? 1 : 0);
5207        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.rangeMinorGridlineStroke);
5208        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.rangeMinorGridlinePaint);
5209        hash = 43 * hash + (this.domainZeroBaselineVisible ? 1 : 0);
5210        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.domainZeroBaselineStroke);
5211        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.domainZeroBaselinePaint);
5212        hash = 43 * hash + (this.rangeZeroBaselineVisible ? 1 : 0);
5213        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.rangeZeroBaselineStroke);
5214        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.rangeZeroBaselinePaint);
5215        hash = 43 * hash + (this.domainCrosshairVisible ? 1 : 0);
5216        hash = 43 * hash +
5217                (int) (Double.doubleToLongBits(this.domainCrosshairValue) ^
5218                (Double.doubleToLongBits(this.domainCrosshairValue) >>> 32));
5219        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.domainCrosshairStroke);
5220        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.domainCrosshairPaint);
5221        hash = 43 * hash + (this.domainCrosshairLockedOnData ? 1 : 0);
5222        hash = 43 * hash + (this.rangeCrosshairVisible ? 1 : 0);
5223        hash = 43 * hash +
5224                (int) (Double.doubleToLongBits(this.rangeCrosshairValue) ^
5225                (Double.doubleToLongBits(this.rangeCrosshairValue) >>> 32));
5226        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.rangeCrosshairStroke);
5227        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.rangeCrosshairPaint);
5228        hash = 43 * hash + (this.rangeCrosshairLockedOnData ? 1 : 0);
5229        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.foregroundDomainMarkers);
5230        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.backgroundDomainMarkers);
5231        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.foregroundRangeMarkers);
5232        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.backgroundRangeMarkers);
5233        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.annotations);
5234        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.domainTickBandPaint);
5235        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.rangeTickBandPaint);
5236        hash = 43 * hash + this.weight;
5237        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.fixedLegendItems);
5238        hash = 43 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.shadowGenerator);
5239        return hash;
5240    }
5241
5242    /**
5243     * Returns a clone of the plot.
5244     *
5245     * @return A clone.
5246     *
5247     * @throws CloneNotSupportedException  this can occur if some component of
5248     *         the plot cannot be cloned.
5249     */
5250    @Override
5251    public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
5252        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
5253        XYPlot<S> clone = (XYPlot) super.clone();
5254        clone.domainAxes = CloneUtils.cloneMapValues(this.domainAxes);
5255        for (ValueAxis axis : clone.domainAxes.values()) {
5256            if (axis != null) {
5257                axis.setPlot(clone);
5258                axis.addChangeListener(clone);
5259            }
5260        }
5261        clone.rangeAxes = CloneUtils.cloneMapValues(this.rangeAxes);
5262        for (ValueAxis axis : clone.rangeAxes.values()) {
5263            if (axis != null) {
5264                axis.setPlot(clone);
5265                axis.addChangeListener(clone);
5266            }
5267        }
5268        clone.domainAxisLocations = new HashMap<>(this.domainAxisLocations);
5269        clone.rangeAxisLocations = new HashMap<>(this.rangeAxisLocations);
5270
5271        // the datasets are not cloned, but listeners need to be added...
5272        clone.datasets = new HashMap<>(this.datasets);
5273        for (XYDataset<S> dataset : clone.datasets.values()) {
5274            if (dataset != null) {
5275                dataset.addChangeListener(clone);
5276            }
5277        }
5278
5279        clone.datasetToDomainAxesMap = new TreeMap<>();
5280        clone.datasetToDomainAxesMap.putAll(this.datasetToDomainAxesMap);
5281        clone.datasetToRangeAxesMap = new TreeMap<>();
5282        clone.datasetToRangeAxesMap.putAll(this.datasetToRangeAxesMap);
5283
5284        clone.renderers = CloneUtils.cloneMapValues(this.renderers);
5285        for (XYItemRenderer renderer : clone.renderers.values()) {
5286            if (renderer != null) {
5287                renderer.setPlot(clone);
5288                renderer.addChangeListener(clone);
5289            }
5290        }
5291        clone.foregroundDomainMarkers = CloneUtils.clone(
5292                this.foregroundDomainMarkers);
5293        clone.backgroundDomainMarkers = CloneUtils.clone(
5294                this.backgroundDomainMarkers);
5295        clone.foregroundRangeMarkers = CloneUtils.clone(
5296                this.foregroundRangeMarkers);
5297        clone.backgroundRangeMarkers = CloneUtils.clone(
5298                this.backgroundRangeMarkers);
5299        clone.annotations = CloneUtils.cloneList(this.annotations);
5300        if (this.fixedDomainAxisSpace != null) {
5301            clone.fixedDomainAxisSpace = CloneUtils.clone(
5302                    this.fixedDomainAxisSpace);
5303        }
5304        if (this.fixedRangeAxisSpace != null) {
5305            clone.fixedRangeAxisSpace = CloneUtils.clone(
5306                    this.fixedRangeAxisSpace);
5307        }
5308        if (this.fixedLegendItems != null) {
5309            clone.fixedLegendItems
5310                    = (LegendItemCollection) this.fixedLegendItems.clone();
5311        }
5312        clone.quadrantOrigin = CloneUtils.clone(this.quadrantOrigin);
5313        clone.quadrantPaint = this.quadrantPaint.clone();
5314        return clone;
5315
5316    }
5317
5318    /**
5319     * Provides serialization support.
5320     *
5321     * @param stream  the output stream.
5322     *
5323     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O error.
5324     */
5325    private void writeObject(ObjectOutputStream stream) throws IOException {
5326        stream.defaultWriteObject();
5327        SerialUtils.writeStroke(this.domainGridlineStroke, stream);
5328        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.domainGridlinePaint, stream);
5329        SerialUtils.writeStroke(this.rangeGridlineStroke, stream);
5330        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.rangeGridlinePaint, stream);
5331        SerialUtils.writeStroke(this.domainMinorGridlineStroke, stream);
5332        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.domainMinorGridlinePaint, stream);
5333        SerialUtils.writeStroke(this.rangeMinorGridlineStroke, stream);
5334        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.rangeMinorGridlinePaint, stream);
5335        SerialUtils.writeStroke(this.rangeZeroBaselineStroke, stream);
5336        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.rangeZeroBaselinePaint, stream);
5337        SerialUtils.writeStroke(this.domainCrosshairStroke, stream);
5338        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.domainCrosshairPaint, stream);
5339        SerialUtils.writeStroke(this.rangeCrosshairStroke, stream);
5340        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.rangeCrosshairPaint, stream);
5341        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.domainTickBandPaint, stream);
5342        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.rangeTickBandPaint, stream);
5343        SerialUtils.writePoint2D(this.quadrantOrigin, stream);
5344        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
5345            SerialUtils.writePaint(this.quadrantPaint[i], stream);
5346        }
5347        SerialUtils.writeStroke(this.domainZeroBaselineStroke, stream);
5348        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.domainZeroBaselinePaint, stream);
5349    }
5350
5351    /**
5352     * Provides serialization support.
5353     *
5354     * @param stream  the input stream.
5355     *
5356     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O error.
5357     * @throws ClassNotFoundException  if there is a classpath problem.
5358     */
5359    private void readObject(ObjectInputStream stream)
5360        throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {
5361
5362        stream.defaultReadObject();
5363        this.domainGridlineStroke = SerialUtils.readStroke(stream);
5364        this.domainGridlinePaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
5365        this.rangeGridlineStroke = SerialUtils.readStroke(stream);
5366        this.rangeGridlinePaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
5367        this.domainMinorGridlineStroke = SerialUtils.readStroke(stream);
5368        this.domainMinorGridlinePaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
5369        this.rangeMinorGridlineStroke = SerialUtils.readStroke(stream);
5370        this.rangeMinorGridlinePaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
5371        this.rangeZeroBaselineStroke = SerialUtils.readStroke(stream);
5372        this.rangeZeroBaselinePaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
5373        this.domainCrosshairStroke = SerialUtils.readStroke(stream);
5374        this.domainCrosshairPaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
5375        this.rangeCrosshairStroke = SerialUtils.readStroke(stream);
5376        this.rangeCrosshairPaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
5377        this.domainTickBandPaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
5378        this.rangeTickBandPaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
5379        this.quadrantOrigin = SerialUtils.readPoint2D(stream);
5380        this.quadrantPaint = new Paint[4];
5381        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
5382            this.quadrantPaint[i] = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
5383        }
5384
5385        this.domainZeroBaselineStroke = SerialUtils.readStroke(stream);
5386        this.domainZeroBaselinePaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
5387
5388        // register the plot as a listener with its axes, datasets, and
5389        // renderers...
5390        for (ValueAxis axis : this.domainAxes.values()) {
5391            if (axis != null) {
5392                axis.setPlot(this);
5393                axis.addChangeListener(this);
5394            }
5395        }
5396        for (ValueAxis axis : this.rangeAxes.values()) {
5397            if (axis != null) {
5398                axis.setPlot(this);
5399                axis.addChangeListener(this);
5400            }
5401        }
5402        for (XYDataset<S> dataset : this.datasets.values()) {
5403            if (dataset != null) {
5404                dataset.addChangeListener(this);
5405            }
5406        }
5407        for (XYItemRenderer renderer : this.renderers.values()) {
5408            if (renderer != null) {
5409                renderer.addChangeListener(this);
5410            }
5411        }
5412
5413    }
5414
5415}
